category.name: Test for Follows, Parent, Modifies, Uses for nested while loop

id.comment: Which parent does statement 2 belongs to?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(s,2);

id.comment: Does statement 4 has child?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent (4,s);

id.comment: Select all the statements which are a child of another statement.

query.querystr: stmt s1,s2; Select s2 such that Parent (s1,s2);

id.comment: Select all the parents.

query.querystr: stmt s1; Select s1 such that Parent (s1,_);

id.comment: Select all the while if there exists a parent relationship

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Parent (_,_);

id.comment: Select all the child statements if it exists

query.querystr: stmt s1; Select s1 such that Parent (_,s1);

id.comment: Is there any nested while loop?

query.querystr: while w1,w2; Select w2 such that Parent (w1,w2);

id.comment: Is there any assignments nested in a while loop?

query.querystr: while w;assign a; Select a such that Parent (w,a);

id.comment: Select all the parents of statement 5.

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(s,5);

id.comment: Select all the while loop which is/are a child of another while loop.

query.querystr: while w1,w2; Select w2 such that Parent* (w1,w2);

id.comment: Select all the assignments nested directly/indrectly in a while loop.

query.querystr: while w;assign a; Select a such that Parent* (w,a);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are modified by statement 1?

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies(1, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are modified by a statement?

query.querystr: variable v;stmt s; Select v such that Modifies(s, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are modified in an assignment?

query.querystr: variable v;assign a; Select v such that Modifies(a, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are modified?

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies(_, v);

id.comment: Which statement modifies variable d?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Modifies(s,"d");

id.comment: Which while statement modifies variable d?

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Modifies(w,"d");

id.comment: Which assignment modifies variable b?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies(a,"b");

id.comment: Which assignment modifies variable vcz?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies(a, "vcz");

id.comment: Select all while if there exists a Modifies relationship.

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Modifies(_,_);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are used by statement 1?

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Uses(1, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are used by a statement?

query.querystr: variable v;stmt s; Select v such that Uses(s, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are used in an assignment?

query.querystr: variable v;assign a; Select v such that Uses(a, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are used?

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Uses(_, v);

id.comment: Which statement uses variable b?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Uses(s,"b");

id.comment: Which while statement uses variable b?

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Uses(w,"b");

id.comment: Which assignment uses variable a?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Uses(a,"a");

id.comment: Which assignment Uses variable vcz?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Uses(a, "vcz");

id.comment: Select all while if there exists a Uses relationship.

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Uses(_,_);

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN while if statement 2 uses b.

query.querystr: Select BOOLEAN such that Uses(2,"b");

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN while if statement 2 uses a.

query.querystr: Select BOOLEAN such that Uses(2,"a");

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN if there exists a Uses relationship.

query.querystr: Select BOOLEAN such that Uses(_,_);

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN if there exists an assignment Uses variable y and modifies c?

query.querystr: assign a; Select BOOLEAN such that Modifies(a,"c") pattern a("c",_"y"_);

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN if there exists an assignment modifies variable d and another asisgnmenent that y =a?

query.querystr: assign a1,a2; Select BOOLEAN such that Modifies(a1,"d") pattern a2("y","a");

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN if there exists an assignment modifies variable d and another asisgnmenent that uses b?

query.querystr: assign a1,a2; Select BOOLEAN such that Modifies(a1,"d") pattern a2("y",_"b"_);

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN if there exists an assignment modifies variable d and uses z?

query.querystr: assign a; Select BOOLEAN pattern a("d",_"z"_);
